name: Blue Sky
description: Blue Sky is the sweet, candy-flavored offspring of LSD and Rocky Mountain Blueberry. This indica-leaning hybrid is a great choice for unwinding, relaxing, and inducing laughing fits. Beautiful in appearance, these shimmering flowers give off blue and red hues when the light hits them.
attributes_title: Happy, Relaxed, Uplifted, Creative, Giggly, Depression, Nausea, Eye Pressure, Headaches, Inflammation, Dry Mouth, Dizzy, Headache, Paranoid, Anxious
